ruleset.name: Apex Design Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex design issues (structure, method signatures, class organization)

rule.name: EnumMinimumValues
rule.message: Enum must contain at least {0} values. Enums with fewer than {0} values may indicate a design issue
rule.description:
Enums must contain at least a minimum number of values. Enums with fewer than the minimum number of values should be reconsidered as they may not provide sufficient flexibility or may indicate a design issue. For boolean-like scenarios, consider using a boolean instead of an enum with only two values.
To customize this rule, edit the $minValues variable at the beginning of the XPath expression (default: 3). This sets the minimum number of enum values required.
Version: 1.0.0
